page.title: 10ABRONHILL HIGH SCHOOL (2)
page.content: Various school trips are held every year to countries such as Bulgaria (skiing), Southern France (water - sports), Italy and Spain. For Guidance purposes all pupils are divided into houses:{Atholl, {Huntly, Locheil and Seaforth.}Each year pupils represent their houses in different events. These events include a swimming gala, cross-country running, football, hockey and quizzes.Prizes are awarded each year for attendance, endeavour and merit. Three primary schools send their primary seven pupils to Abronhill High School:Abronhill Primary, Glenhead Primary and Whitelees Primary. Sometimes pupils from the Roman Catholic primary school come as well because they would have to get a bus to the nearest Roman Catholic High School. .
